security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing design guidelines and best practices. No executable code, network requests, or security-sensitive operations detected.

content.value_statement: Transform generic AI designs into memorable, production-ready interfaces. This skill guides you to create distinctive frontend experiences that stand out from typical AI aesthetics.
actual_capabilities: Guides creation of unique frontend interfaces with distinctive aesthetics
Provides specific typography, color, and layout recommendations
Includes CSS animation and interaction patterns
Offers design thinking framework for web projects
limitations: Requires manual implementation of suggested designs
Design guidance is subjective and style-specific
No automated design generation - provides instructions only

use_cases.title: Build unique landing pages
use_cases.description: Create distinctive SaaS landing pages that avoid generic AI aesthetics with bold typography and creative layouts.

use_cases.title: Design memorable dashboards
use_cases.description: Develop data dashboards with sophisticated dark themes, subtle animations, and user-friendly interfaces.

use_cases.title: Craft custom component libraries
use_cases.description: Build reusable React components with unique styling, smooth animations, and consistent design systems.

prompt_templates.title: Landing Page Design
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a unique landing page for a B2B SaaS product. Use a modern tech aesthetic with Space Mono for headings and DM Sans for body text. Create an asymmetric hero section with a 70/30 split layout. Include glassmorphism CTA buttons and scroll-triggered fade-in animations.

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard Interface
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a dark-themed analytics dashboard for data visualization. Use IBM Plex Sans font family with a sophisticated color palette of deep blues and cyan accents. Implement card-based layouts with subtle hover animations and skeleton loading states.

prompt_templates.title: Component Library
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a set of custom React button components with multiple variants (primary, secondary, text). Include size options, loading states, and smooth hover animations. Use styled-components and ensure accessibility compliance.

prompt_templates.title: Portfolio Website
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a unique portfolio website with editorial magazine style. Use Playfair Display for headlines and Source Sans Pro for body text. Implement asymmetric grids, overlapping elements, and sophisticated typography hierarchy.

output_examples.input: Create a landing page for my AI startup
output: Unique hero section with gradient grid background and noise texture overlay
Bold typography using Space Grotesk (4rem headline) with precise letter-spacing
Glassmorphism CTA with backdrop-filter blur and subtle border
Color scheme: Deep purple primary (#6B46C1) with electric blue accents (#00D4FF)
Mobile-first responsive design with fluid typography

best_practices: Always choose unique fonts - avoid Inter, Roboto, and system fonts for distinctive designs
Implement CSS variables for consistent theming and easy customization
Design with accessibility in mind - ensure WCAG AA contrast ratios and keyboard navigation
Use semantic HTML structure with proper ARIA labels for better accessibility
anti_patterns: Never use generic color schemes like white background with purple gradients
Avoid centered grid layouts - experiment with asymmetric compositions
Don't overuse animations - each animation should enhance user experience
Never skip responsive design - always test on multiple screen sizes

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all frontend frameworks?
faq.answer: Yes, the design principles work with React, Vue, Angular, or vanilla HTML/CSS. Examples are provided for multiple frameworks.

faq.question: What are the limitations of the design guidance?
faq.answer: The skill provides design direction and code examples, but you'll need to implement the actual code. Designs are suggestions, not automated generation.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing design system?
faq.answer: Absolutely. The CSS variables and component patterns can be adapted to work with existing design systems and brand guidelines.

faq.question: How does this ensure my designs won't look like typical AI output?
faq.answer: The skill specifically guides away from common AI patterns like Inter fonts and purple gradients, focusing on unique aesthetic choices and bold design decisions.

faq.question: What if my design breaks on mobile devices?
faq.answer: All examples include mobile-first responsive design patterns. Test on multiple screen sizes and use the provided responsive utilities.

faq.question: How does this compare to using a UI framework like Bootstrap?
faq.answer: This skill creates custom, unique designs rather than generic framework styles. It teaches design thinking rather than applying pre-built components.
